import_pheweb.filter_sumstat.columns: #pheno #chrom pos ref alt mlogp beta sebeta FINNGEN_beta UKBB_beta FINNGEN_pval UKBB_pval FINNGEN_af_alt UKBB_af_alt all_inv_var_het_p
import_pheweb.matrix_longformat.out_colu: #pheno chr pos ref alt mlogp beta sebeta FINNGEN_beta UKBB_beta FINNGEN_pval UKBB_pval FINNGEN_af_alt UKBB_af_alt all_inv_var_het_p
import_pheweb.preprocess.preprocessor: awk -v new_header_len=22 'BEGIN{FS=OFS="	"; split("#CHR POS REF ALT SNP FINNGEN_beta FINNGEN_sebeta FINNGEN_pval FINNGEN_af_alt FINNGEN_af_alt_cases FINNGEN_af_alt_controls UKBB_beta UKBB_sebeta UKBB_pval UKBB_af_alt all_meta_N all_inv_var_meta_beta all_inv_var_meta_sebeta all_inv_var_meta_p all_inv_var_meta_mlogp all_inv_var_het_p rsid", new_header, " "); getline; for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) {header[i] = $i; header_idx[$i] = i}; for (i=1; i<=new_header_len; i++) printf "%s%s", new_header[i], (i<new_header_len ? OFS : ORS)} NR>1 {split($0, values, FS); for (i=1; i<=new_header_len; i++) {printf "%s%s", (new_header[i] in header_idx ? values[header_idx[new_header[i]]] : "NA"), (i<new_header_len ? OFS : ORS)}}'
